entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -21.6°C
entry.summary:

Temperature: -21.6°C

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 62 %

Dewpoint: -26.9°C

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 29 except minus 34 inland.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 29 except minus 34 inland. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 16 with temperature rising to minus 11 by morning. Wind chill near minus 22. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.summary: Snow. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Wednesday 01 February 2023
